summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: both the category template and the category page now filter the fetched products to only those whose product.category equals the current categorySlug, and the product grid/empty-state logic is driven by the filtered list rather than the full getProducts() result.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds an explicit "Category Not Found" invalid-slug handling UI (with navigation back to home).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to filter the category listing by categorySlug; it did not request adding invalid-category handling or a new not-found state for category pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds/changes category page UI structure with a "Back to Home" button and two stacked CategoryImageCarousel components on the category page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is scoped to filtering behavior on the category listing; it did not request adding or changing header/navigation/carousel layout on the category page.
